name: Vegan Cauliflower Parmesan Pasta Bake
description: Vegan Cauliflower Parmesan Pasta Bake. Pasta, marinara sauce, Crispy Cauliflower slices coated in breadcrumbs and spices, and vegan mozzarella make a great Cauliflower Parmigiana. Soy-free Recipe. Can be gluten-free. Makes 1 9 by 9 dish

video.name: Vegan Cauliflower Parmesan Pasta Bake | Vegan Richa
video.description:
Cauliflower Parmesan Pasta Bake! 
RECIPE: http://www.veganricha.com/2017/04/vegan-cauliflower-parmesan-pasta-bake.html

Pasta, Marinara sauce, Crispy Cauliflower slices coated in breadcrumbs and spices, and Vegan Mozzarella make a great Cauliflower Parmigiana! 
Soy-free Recipe. Can be gluten-free.

SUBSCRIBE: https://www.youtube.com/veganricharecipes?sub_confirmation=1

#vegan #veganism #easyveganrecipes #veganrecipes #veganricha #cooking

recipeIngredient: 1/4 inch slices from half a head of cauliflower
2.5 cups of marinara or tomato basil sauce (plus more for serving)
vegan mozzarella slices such as miyoko's kitchen

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F/ 200ºc.
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F/ 200ºc.

recipeInstructions.text: Place cauliflower slices on parchment lined sheet. Spray or brush olive oil. Sprinkle with old bay seasoning, garlic, salt and pepper. Bake for 17 to 18 minutes. *See alternate breaded cauliflower in notes.
recipeInstructions.name: Place cauliflower slices on parchment lined sheet. Spray or brush olive oil. Sprinkle with old bay seasoning, garlic, salt and pepper. Bake for 17 to 18 minutes. *See alternate breaded cauliflower in notes.

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, Boil the water for the pasta in a saucepan, add the pasta and cook to al dente. Drain and add to a baking dish.
recipeInstructions.name: Meanwhile, Boil the water for the pasta in a saucepan, add the pasta and cook to al dente. Drain and add to a baking dish.

recipeInstructions.text: Add marinara or tomato basil sauce and toss to coat. Add 1/4 cup water on the edges.
recipeInstructions.name: Add marinara or tomato basil sauce and toss to coat. Add 1/4 cup water on the edges.

recipeInstructions.text: Place the baked cauliflower on the pasta. Spread vegan mozzarella slices on the cauliflower.
recipeInstructions.name: Place the baked cauliflower on the pasta. Spread vegan mozzarella slices on the cauliflower.

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl mix breadcrumbs with vegan parm. Sprinkle this all over the cauliflower slices and the pasta.
recipeInstructions.name: In a bowl mix breadcrumbs with vegan parm. Sprinkle this all over the cauliflower slices and the pasta.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake at 400 degrees F  / 200ºc for 20 to 25 minutes or until mozzarella is melted and bubbly. Sprinkle fresh chopped basil leaves and pepper flakes. Serve with crusty garlic bread and additional marinara on top.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake at 400 degrees F  / 200ºc for 20 to 25 minutes or until mozzarella is melted and bubbly. Sprinkle fresh chopped basil leaves and pepper flakes. Serve with crusty garlic bread and additional marinara on top.
